item.title: Brexit Hurts UK Investment Appeal, Hasn't Reduced Tax or Regulation
item.description: Brexit Hurts UK Investment Appeal, Hasn’t Reduced Tax or Regulation A new study by the Centre for European Reform (CER) found that Brexit has hurt the UK’s investment appeal, with foreign direct investment (FDI) falling by 25% in the two years since the UK left the European Union.
